articles.description: Defender Team New Zealand beat Luna Rossa in the seventh and eighth races of the 36th America’s Cup to open up a two-race lead for the first time in this year’s event
articles.content:
Team New Zealand surged to a 5-3 lead over Luna Rossa in the Americas Cup after a dramatic race eight as both boats struggled to stay on their foils in light winds off the coast of Auckland.
TNZ won… [+1892 chars]
